content.question: The United States commitment of troops to European countries shown in the graph reflects a foreign policy built primarily around

choices.label: participating in collective security arrangements such as the North Atlantic Treaty Organization
seeking isolation from issues elsewhere in the world
restricting all trade with communist nations that belonged to the Warsaw Pact
seeking confrontation with the Soviet Union

content.answer: participating in collective security arrangements such as the North Atlantic Treaty Organization
